Evaluate a prior distribution density over parameter values.

Source: R/PCMPrior.R
PriorDensity.Rd

Evaluate a prior distribution density over parameter values.

PriorDensity(prior, vecParams, log = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

prior

a PCMPrior object.
vecParams

a numerical vector.
log

logical indicating if a log-prior should be returned (default: TRUE).

Value

The returned value depends on the S3 class of prior.

  • For any class except 'PCMPrior', it should be a numeric vector of length equal to length(vecParams). If the the prior distributions for the elements in vecParams, are independent, then each element in the returned vector corresponds to the (log-)prior density of the corresponding element in vecParams. Otherwise, the first element in the returned vector corresponds to the joint (log-)prior density and the other elements are set to 1 (if log=FALSE) or to 0 (if log=TRUE).

  • For class 'PCMPrior', this should be a single real number corresponding to the joint prior (log-)density of the elements in vecParams.

Details

This is an S3 generic function. Call methods("PCMPriorDensity") to see implementing methods.
